td.content: s:pt presents with mild low back pain for 4 weeks. patient also reports mild pain radiating from the back to the buttocks. he is a 38 YO white male. o:Height 162 cm, Weight 52.1 kg, Temperature 36.6 C, Pulse 81, SystolicBP 103, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, Back= mild tenderness of lumbar spine area, decrease ROM in all direction a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Methocarbamol - 1500 mg po q 12h x 3 days, and ordered CBC, HLA B27, spine XRY.

Value.Value: ordered CBC , HLA B 27 , spine XRY
